  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1015</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1015</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els quadrats, els rombes i els seus amics</string>
            <string language="en">Squares, rhombuses and friends</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadrate, Rhombuses und Freunde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Places, losanges et amis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quadrados, rhombuses e amigos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quadrato, rhombuses ed amici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τετράγωνα, rhombuses και φίλοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb dos apartats que tracten els criteris de classificació dels quadrilàters. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació i d'identificació de diferents tipologies de quadrilàters. L'apartat "Practica" presenta activitats interactives desenvolupades amb la calculadora Wiris com a suport per a l'estudi dels quadrilàters.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) with two sections on criteria for classifying quadrilaterals. It includes activities for self-assessment and for identifying different kinds of quadrilaterals. The practice section includes interactive exercises with the Wiris calculator for studying quadrilaterals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geometria</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plain</string>
            <string language="es">llanura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) mit zwei Kapiteln auf Kriterien für das Einstufen der 
Vierecke. Er schließt Aktivitäten für Selbstbewertung und 
für das Kennzeichnen der unterschiedlichen Arten der Vierecke ein. 
Das Praxiskapitel schließt interaktive Übungen mit dem Wiris 
Rechner für das Studieren der Vierecke ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) 
avec deux sections sur des critères pour classifier des 
quadrilatères. Elle inclut des activités pour 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment et pour identifier différents genres de 
quadrilatères. La section de pratique inclut des exercices 
interactifs avec la calculatrice de Wiris pour étudier des 
quadrilatères.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) com duas
seções em critérios para classificar quadrilaterals. Inclui 
atividades para o self-assessment e para identificar tipos diferentes 
dos quadrilaterals. A seção da prática inclui exercícios 
interativos com a calculadora de Wiris para estudar quadrilaterals.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) con 
due sezioni sui test di verifica per classificare i quadrilaterals. 
Include le attività per la valutazione di se stesso e per 
identificare i generi differenti di quadrilaterals. La sezione 
di pratica include le esercitazioni interattive con il calcolatore di 
Wiris per studiare i quadrilaterals.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) με δύο 
τμήματα κριτηρίων για την ταξινόμηση των quadrilaterals. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες για την αυτοαξιολόγηση και 
για τον προσδιορισμό των διαφορετικών ειδών quadrilaterals. 
Το τμήμα πρακτικής περιλαμβάνει τις διαλογικές ασκήσεις με 
τον υπολογιστή Wiris για τη μελέτη των quadrilaterals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ebene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planície</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pianura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σαφής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
